articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Cookie Run: Kingdom’s Disney crossover event goes live

articles.content: Disney is sprinkling its magic dust on the lands ofCookie Run: Kingdom. On Thursday, developer Devsisters launched an update called Festival of Dreams and Wishes that brings 20 well-known Disney char… [+2038 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: She-Hulk’s Daredevil addition was a surprise, even for the writers
articles.description: Charlie Cox’s Daredevil is coming to Disney Plus’ She-Hulk series, but creator Jessica Gao was shocked they could get the rights to the character. She-Hulk will premiere on Aug. 17.
articles.content: The Man Without Fear has already made his debut in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, but his biggest role yet is coming next month with Disney Plus She-Hulk series. It turns out, though, that bringing D… [+2045 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Say goodbye to Roblox’s iconic ‘oof’ sound effect
articles.description: Fans of Roblox may notice that a familiar, iconic sound is gone: the oof sound effect, which often played upon taking damage or death. Now it’s been replaced with a “dehhh” due to licensing issues and copyright.
articles.content: Sometimes, very small parts of a game can have a surprisingly large presence in the zeitgeist, like press F to pay respects from Call of Duty. One of these small but mighty memes is the oof sound fro… [+1608 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: Eight Yakuza games coming to PlayStation Plus in 2022, beginning in August
articles.description: The Yakuza games are coming to PlayStation Plus throughout the rest of 2022, starting with Like A Dragon, Yakuza 0, Yakuza Kiwami, and Yakuza Kiwami 2.
articles.content: A whole host of Yakuza games, including the Kazuma Kiryu saga and the most recent and highly acclaimed Yakuza: Like A Dragon are on the way to PlayStation Plus. The series will be gradually released … [+1276 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Never Have I Ever season 3 brings the biggest drama yet: a real relationship
articles.description: Mindy Kaling’s Never Have I Ever returns to Netflix for season 3 on Aug. 12. Maitreyi Ramakrishnan stars as Devi, who is finally dating her dream boy, Paxton Hall-Yoshida.

articles.author: Samit Sarkar
articles.title: PlayStation Plus August 2022 free games include Yakuza: Like a Dragon
articles.description: The free titles for all PS Plus subscribers in August 2022 are Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 and 2 (the modern remakes), Yakuza: Like a Dragon, and Little Nightmares. They’ll be released to customers on Aug. 2.
articles.content:
Yakuza: Like a Dragon and Tony Hawks Pro Skater 1 and 2 will be available for free to all PlayStation Plus subscribers in August, Sony announced Wednesday.

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Dwarf Fortress’ new pixel artist is crushing it
articles.description: Dwarf Fortress is getting graphics, and they look pretty great so far. Kitfox and Bay 12 Games have doled out some more new art featuring animal folk.
articles.content: Dwarf Fortress, the beautifully complex colony simulation game from the two-person team at Bay 12 Games, is in the process of getting a dramatic facelift. Developers released a new set of sprites tod… [+2064 chars]

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Fate: The Winx Saga season 2 returns to Netflix this fall
articles.description: The live-action Winx Club series returns to Netflix on Sept. 16 with season 2. Abigail Cowen stars as Bloom, and this season Flora finally joins the cast.
articles.content: And at long last, Flora joins the cast

articles.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 details revealed in report on Rockstar’s new culture
articles.description: Grand Theft Auto 6 developer Rockstar Games is changing its culture and development process according to a new report, which is leading to welcome changes in the franchise, and slower development.

articles.title: Bernard the Hot Elf officially joins the new Santa Clause series
articles.description: Tim Allen and Elizabeth Mitchell return to The Santa Clause for the Disney Plus series... and now so will David Krumholtz as fan favorite Bernard the Head Elf. The series will launch later in 2022.
